item.title: Seasonal Bump Functions
item.description: Motivated by the nice talk on Winning with Simple, even Linear, Models by Vincent D. Warmerdam, we briefly describe how to construct bump function to encode seasonal variables in R. Prepare Notebook library(glue) library(lubridate) library(magrittr) library(tidyverse) Generate Data Let us generate a time sequence variable stored in a tibble. # Define time sequence. t <- seq.Date(from = as.Date("2017-07-01"), to = as.Date("2019-04-01"), by = "day") # Store it in a tibble.
